description:
沪江英乐：天灰Skylar Grey专辑三单《Wear Me Out》。坠入爱河依然唱出无奈之感，她最近的歌让歌迷们很惊艳，个人风格独特强烈，声音和旋律结合的非常完美，还有一种画面感很强的feel。

【天灰Skylar Grey专辑三单《Wear Me Out》】

歌词：

Smart as little girl
always on the run
playing with a fire
when daddy's gone.
Falling in love on stolen wine
where did we go wrong my foolish child?
She said...
I'm too young to drink
too green to think
you say these things
and it wears me out.
Too young too frail
but sometimes I feel like old blue jeans
'cause you wear me out.
You wear me out.

Who are you to judge
miss accidental wife.
Who was the genius
that brought me to life?
Well you're such a hypocrite  
to think me so unwise.
I'm just trying to see the world
through my own eyes.
But you say...
I'm too young to drink
too green to think
you say these things
and it wears me out.
Too young too frail  
but sometimes I feel like old blue jeans
'cause you wear me out.
You wear me out.

Well I'm tattered and torn
see what you do.
Just admit it was all because of you
when I don't come home
'til the early morning.

I'm too young to drink
too green to think
you say these things
and it wears me out.
Too young too frail
but sometimes I feel like old blue jeans
'cause you wear me out.
You wear me out.
Don't you know that you wear me out.
You wear me out.

  • 邓文迪默多克离婚战：关于邓文迪你不知道的9件事
  • 热门TED演讲：二十岁是不是可以挥霍的光阴？
  • 2013年6月英语四级六级真题及答案汇总
  • 三亚游客强抱搁浅海豚合影 终因失血过多死亡
  • 做个健康的吃货：世界上最有营养的10种食物
  • 浪漫其实并不难：如何做一个浪漫的人？
  • 从零基础到英语达人：新概念帮你轻松搞定！
  • 高考后留学计划—2014秋季入学备考方法
  • 《植物大战僵尸2》七月全球登场 超萌预告发布（视频）
  • 感人视频：老夫妇病床前合唱《You are my sunshine》

title: 空灵女神Skylar Grey新专辑三单《Wear Me Out》
